name: Sweet & Spicy Gyoza Glaze
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together the water and cornstarch to make a slurry.
In a small saucepan, combine soy sauce, hoisin sauce, rice vinegar, sriracha, sugar, and sesame oil.
Heat the sauce gently over medium-low heat until it starts to bubble.
Add the cornstarch slurry and stir constantly for 30–60 seconds until the glaze thickens and becomes glossy.
Toss cooked gyoza in the glaze or brush it over them.
Garnish with thinly sliced green onions just before serving.
storage_tips: Store leftover glaze in an airtight container in the fridge for up to 3 days. Reheat gently before using.
